feed.title: Journal of the SVDSA
feed.subtitle: News and updates for the peninsula, Bay Area, and beyond.

entry.title: General Meeting Survey
entry.content:
The SVDSA is ready to start putting together regular General Meetings. These would be regular events, probably 60 to 90 minutes, likely held twice per month. To try and narrow down a time and place for these meetings, we’ve put together a short survey to get your feedback on when and where works for the most people.

Click here to take the survey.
